name: Rocket Lander G-8: Beyond the Moons of Saturn
name_original: Rocket Lander G-8: Beyond the Moons of Saturn
description:
"One of the best I have played."
"This is a fun retro style arcade game. Easy to play and challenging."
"Super Fun, Super Simple, Not always so easy. I Love it."
"Good Clean Fun -- A game for everyone to try."
"This is the best moon lander game I have played."

Pilot a rocket down to the surface in this game challenging game of skill. By simply controlling the left, right and main engines of a lunar lander, you must safely touch down on a landing pad before you run out of fuel.
There are 25 levels in the standard game. You can also play a set of 10 randomly-generated levels. Plus there are two special challenge levels. You can play the main levels in sequence and go for a high score, or practice each level individually.
